title: [AUTH] Google AI OAuth integration
description: Phase 3: Google OAuth endpoints, GoogleAi provider variant, ion login google command

logs.msg:
OAuth infrastructure complete. GoogleAi provider integrated with:
- Google OAuth flow (PKCE)
- Token storage in ~/.config/ion/auth.json
- TUI provider picker shows GoogleAi
- Model fetching maps to Google models
Needs real-world testing with actual Google AI subscription.
Renamed from GoogleAi to Gemini. CLI: ion login gemini. Uses Gemini CLI client ID.
